title: How long until we get to play again? [patch 6.17 update]
body:
Quote: starting at, 01:30 Pacific Time (08:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 6.17. At 03:00 Pacific time (10:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

Does this means that we can start playing 3 hours after 1:30 PT or at 6:00am after 3:00 PT update?

replies.body: The new patch is live and login should be available now.  Let me know if you're having any issues, and with any detail that can help get it resolved.  I'll be around!
